lead_paragraph: Defending champion Novak Djokovic trounced stand-in David Goffin 6-1 6-2 for a clean sweep of his group at the ATP World Tour Finals on Thursday but spiced up a leisurely afternoon workout by picking a row with the umpire.
snippet: Defending champion Novak Djokovic trounced stand-in David Goffin 6-1 6-2 for a clean sweep of his group at the ATP World Tour Finals on Thursday but spiced up a leisurely afternoon workout by picking a row with the umpire....

headline.main: Djokovic Thrashes Goffin, Picks Row With Umpire
headline.print_headline: Djokovic Thrashes Goffin, Picks Row With Umpire
